Module JParseSignature


module JParseSignature: sig .. end
This module handles the decoding of descriptors and signatures.

Parsing descriptors and their components 


val parse_objectType : string -> JBasics.object_type
Raises Class_structure_error if the string does not correspond the an object type.
val parse_field_descriptor : string -> JBasics.value_type
Raises Class_structure_error if the string does not correspond the a field descriptor.
val parse_method_descriptor : string -> JBasics.value_type list * JBasics.value_type option
Raises Class_structure_error if the string does not correspond the a method descriptor.
val parse_descriptor : string -> JBasics.descriptor
Raises Class_structure_error if the string does not correspond the a descriptor.

Parsing generic signatures


val parse_ClassSignature : string -> JSignature.classSignature
parse_ClassSignature s parses a Signature attribute and expects to find a ClassSignature (as describe in paragraph 4.4.4 of the Java Virtual Machine Specification of Java 5).
Raises Class_structure_error if the signature does not correspond to the specifications.
val parse_MethodTypeSignature : string -> JSignature.methodTypeSignature
parse_MethodTypeSignature s parses a Signature attribute and expects to find a Methodtypesignature (as describe in paragraph 4.4.4 of the Java Virtual Machine Specification of Java 5).
Raises Class_structure_error if the signature does not correspond to the specifications.
val parse_FieldTypeSignature : string -> JSignature.fieldTypeSignature
parse_FieldTypeSignature s parses a Signature attribute s and expects to find a FieldTypeSignature (as describe in paragraph 4.4.4 of the Java Virtual Machine Specification of Java 5).
Raises Class_structure_error if the signature does not correspond to the specifications.
